description:
An artist who earns his living selling counterfeit paintings. He had once been attracted by http://anidb.net/ch94700 [Satou] feeling sense of loss and invited her to pose for his drawing.
The artist was originally living in Satou`s apartment. This man had tried to strangle http://anidb.net/ch94702 [Shio] to make Satou grieve for her and was murdered.
name: Gaka no Otoko
